channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Bonne nouvelle pour le prix des voitures électriques en France avec la hausse du bonus écologique en 2026
item.description: Bonne nouvelle si vous voulez acheter une voiture électrique en 2026 : votre facture devrait être inférieure, grâce au bonus écologique, dont le montant a augmenté pour tous les foyers. On fait le point, avec les fameux coup de pouce CEE.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 8 and Z Flip 8 could be lighter than ever — and bigger battery capacities are also rumored
item.description: A new year means new foldables, and we might have learned some more about Samsung's next foldable phones.

item.title: Experts warn PC prices could rise even more in 2026 as RAM costs set to soar higher
item.description: PCs and smartphones could become far more expensive from the second half of 2026 due to memory shortages, experts warn.

item.title: How Protesters Became Content for the Cops
item.description: The tactics behind protest policing are changing—from one of cooperation to intentional antagonism for political marketing purposes.

item.title: Punkt’s German-made MC03 smartphone comes to the US this spring
item.description: Punkt, the Switzerland-based, privacy-focused phone maker, is trying the whole "smartphone" thing again. The MC03 improves on some of the disappointing features of its previous effort, the MC02, while maintaining its security focus. Likewise, its software still comes with a subscription fee: the first year is included free, but it's $12 per month after that. […]...

item.title: The Trump phone just missed another release date
item.description: Where's the Trump Phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump Phone's whereabouts. As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, it's missed yet another of its promised release dates. When we started writing about Trump Mobile regularly, it all […]

item.title: Minimal phone pioneer Punkt is back with a new privacy-focused model at CES
item.description: The Swiss minimal phone pioneer Punkt is back with another model, the MC03. The new handset continues Punkt's focus on privacy, security and digital minimalism.If you've never seen Punkt's MP01 and MP02, the company's gorgeously minimal dumb phone line, they're something to behold. (The MP01 is quite literally a museum piece, in New York’s Museum of Modern Art.) Meanwhile, this new MC03 is the company's second stab at a more practical touchscreen smartphone, following 2023’s MC02. What you lose in physical beauty and tactile buttons, you gain in flexibility.As before, the smartphone runs the p...

item.title: These 6 U.S. streets will become scenic pedestrian zones in 2026
item.description: Half a dozen U.S. cities will permanently reduce or remove car traffic on some of their streets. 2026 will be a good year for people who love to walk where cars once drove.

item.title: AI will change the way you shop in 2026
item.description: AI is already helping people find the stuff they need to buy. Next year, we might just let it buy it on our behalf. Imagine this: One day, you won’t have to waste hours of your life doing your most arduous, least favorite forms of shopping. You know what I’m talking about—buying Christmas presents for distant aunts, getting supplies for your kid’s birthday, ordering groceries for dinner....

item.title: Former Grand Theft Auto technical director discusses GTA 6 delay — 'It’s much better if they announce a game and then six months later it comes out'
item.description: A former Grand Theft Auto developer has discussed the multiple GTA 6 delays in a recent interview. Here's the key highlights.

item.title: Age verification changed the internet in 2025 – here's what it means for your privacy in 2026
item.description: We spoke with leading privacy experts and VPN industry analysts to discuss age verification online and explore why your privacy could be at risk in 2026.

item.title: Une Renault 5 à moins de 20 000 euros, la Twingo sous les 14 000 euros : le bonus écologique est taillé pour les voitures électriques françaises
item.description: Le bonus écologique pour l’achat de véhicules électriques rebondit : qu'est-ce que cela signifie pour le marché français ? Une R5 à moins de 20 000 € et une Twingo sous 14 000 € dès le 1er juillet !

item.description: Want to watch Hell's Kitchen from anywhere? Stream every new twist as chefs face brutal challengers, fiery eliminations, and Ramsay's relentless pressure.

item.title: You Can Track Plenty of Fitness Stats With Just Your Phone—No Wearables Required
item.description: You can log your steps, track your sleep, and measure your progress toward your goals using your phone alone.

item.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 6 is the 'first time we really understand' its most underrated villain, says star
item.description: Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 6 ends with a shocking death nobody will see coming — and it's the 'first time' one underrated villain is really understood.

item.title: Le renouveau des PC Windows ARM arrive très vite avec le Snapdragon X2 Elite, rendez-vous au CES 2026
item.description: Une fuite observée chez Lenovo il y a quelques jours tend à confirmer l'arrivée au CES de la toute nouvelle génération de PC portables ARM sous Snapdragon X2 Elite. Très attendues, ces machines devraient constituer un renouveau des plus bienvenus sur le terrain des appareils Windows ARM.

item.title: 007 First Light is no longer releasing in March following a delay – ‘these additional two months will allow us to further polish and refine the experience’
item.description: IO Interactive has delayed 007 First Light, with the upcoming spy action thriller now releasing in May. This marks a two month delay, with more updates coming early 2026.

item.title: « Les concurrents n’auront rien à copier » : la déclaration provocante du patron de BYD sur les voitures électrique
item.description: L’un des patrons de BYD estime qu’il est important pour le leader de la voiture électrique de continuer à innover. Et cela afin de stimuler la concurrence et de faire évoluer l’industrie. Tout en faisant en sorte de rester numéro 1.

item.title: Marvels Wonder Man trailer sees the MCU get meta
item.description: The MCU turns inward in the upcoming Disney+ miniseries "Wonder Man," starring Yahya Abdul-Mateen II. Watch the trailer.

item.title: The best rice cooker for 2026
item.description: A great rice cooker can change the way you handle weeknight meals. Instead of watching the pot or dealing with uneven results, you get fluffy, consistent rice with almost no effort. Modern rice cookers can do a lot more than white rice, too. Many handle brown rice, oatmeal and grains, and some function like mini multi-cookers for soups or stews.With so many options available, the best rice cooker for you depends on how often you cook, how much counter space you have and which features matter most. We tested a range of models to find the best rice cookers for everything from small kitchens to b...

item.title: What Is the ‘Super Flu’ That Is Spreading in Europe and the United States?
item.description: The “super flu” behind outbreaks in the US and UK is a new variant of influenza A H3N2, subclade K. Existing vaccines appear to be insufficiently effective against the virus.

item.title: 'Zombie subscriptions’ are a silent killer – here are 3 ways to fix them for 2026 in minutes
item.description: Track down those subscriptions you aren't making use of and save yourself some money over the next 12 months.

item.title: AI’s most important benchmark in 2026? Trust
item.description: ‘My own trust of chatbots grew in 2025. But it has also diminished.’ In 2026 (and beyond) the best benchmark for large language models won’t be MMLU or AgentBench or GAIA. It will be trust—something AI will have to rebuild before it can be broadly useful and valuable to both consumers and businesses.

item.title: L’objet interstellaire 3I/Atlas a-t-il tenté de communiquer par radio selon le Seti comme le ferait une sonde E.T ?
item.description: Depuis longtemps, les scientifiques imaginent que nos émissions radio dans la Voie lactée pourraient avoir attiré l'attention de civilisations extraterrestres suffisamment avancées pour avoir construit des sondes robotisées voyageant à une fraction notable de la vitesse de la lumière, et ce, il...

item.title: SpaceX will lower Starlink satellites to reduce collision risk
item.description: After one of its Starlink satellites exploded and another narrowly avoided colliding with a Chinese satellite, SpaceX says it will lower the orbit of thousands of Starlink satellites to increase safety. Of the over 9,000 Starlink satellites currently operating in low Earth orbit, SpaceX says it'll lower about 4,400 from 550km above the Earth's surface […]...

item.title: BYD change de stratégie grâce à l’hybride : le plan du géant chinois pour contourner les taxes et inonder l’Europe
item.description: Déjà leader mondial de la voiture électrique, BYD veut désormais aussi se faire une place au sommet sur l’hybride. Et pour cela, le constructeur mise notamment sur ses prix.

item.title: The Freestyle+ : le petit vidéoprojecteur de Samsung évolue, c’est l’IA qui règle l’image pour vous
item.description: La nouvelle version de The Freestyle corrige le principal point faible de la précédente et intègre une surprise de taille : une fonctionnalité d’optimisation de l’image par IA.
